about_the_game:
The Sin Slayers Soundtrack features remastered tracks from the original game, offering a refreshed take on the atmospheric music that sets the tone for every moment in the Valley of Fallen Sinners. Immerse yourself in the haunting melodies and dynamic compositions that served as the background to your adventures.

Dive into the hauntingly beautiful melodies that bring the Valley of Fallen Sinners to life, crafted with care and passion for true fans of the game.
